page.title: 19The village shop.
page.content: Built some 100 years ago the cottage was converted to accomodate a shop by J.Arthur Rank, shortly after the war, for one of his war-wounded former employees. The store has a minor claim to fame through being featured in the film "The Triple Echo". The Store suffered fluctuations in its fortunes according to the attitude of its owners and the general trend toward Supermarket shopping. The present owners took over the business with little goodwill and even less stock,and set about the task of changing the acquired habits of the villagers by stocking a range of immediate needs, There are now some 2800 different items available. The success of the venture proves that the village shop will always be an essential part of village life.
